step-1.title: What kind of mount style would you like?

options.title: INSIDE MOUNT
options.description:
Window depth requirement for Inside Mount:
At least 2 3/4 inches for Handwoven shades
2 inches for Roman shades
4 inches for Motorized Shades

options.title: OUTSIDE MOUNT
options.description: We recommend adding a minimum of 2 inches to width and 4-6 inches to height to allow light gap coverage.

step-2-1-1.title: What is the window width (frame inner edge to edge)?
step-2-1-1.description: Measuring the top, middle, and bottom points improves accuracy

step-2-2-1.title: What is the width of the window (frame outer edge to edge)?

step-2-2-2.title: How many inches would you like to add the width?
step-2-2-2.description: We recommend to add at least 1-2 inches on each side to minimize light seepage and enhance privacy

step-3-1-1.title: What is the height of your window?
step-3-1-1.description: Measuring the left, middle, and right points improves accuracy

options.title: Breaks on Window Frame
options.description: Custom-fit for a tailored look with full light blocking

options.title: Puddles on Window Frame
options.description: Added 2" for better light coverage and a cozy, softly stacked finish

step-3-2-1.title: What is the height of your window (frame outer edge to edge)?

step-3-2-2.title: How many inches above the window would you like to mount the shade?
step-3-2-2.description: We recommend adding at least 4-6 inches to allow window exposure when you roll the shades up.

options.title: Breaks on Window Frame
options.description: Custom-fit for a tailored look with full light blocking

options.title: Puddles on Window Frame
options.description: Added 2" for better light coverage and a cozy, softly stacked finish
